## IEntityDebugData.entityDetailsMap property

实体详细信息映射

**Signature:**

```typescript

        id: number;
        name: string;
        active: boolean;
        enabled: boolean;
        activeInHierarchy: boolean;
        destroyed: boolean;
        tag: number;
        updateOrder: number;
        componentMask: string;
        parentId: number | null;
        parentName: string | null;
        childCount: number;
        childIds: number[];
        depth: number;
```
